summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Water Supply System; providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property and property rights in portions of Township 26 North, Range 7 East, W. M.; Township 26 North, Range 6 East, W. M.; Township 26 North, Range 5 East, W. M.; Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W. M., including portions of Loma Vista Addition, Lake Forest Park Estates Addition, and the First Addition to Lake Forest Park; for a watermain pipe line right-of-way as a part of certain additions and betterments to the existing system.
